code: import React from"react";import{useTaskContent}from"./util";import"./taskContent.css";import{Header,Stats,Track,FullDetailsView}from"..";import{FallingLines}from"react-loader-spinner";import{primary}from"../../constants/colors";import placeholder from"../../assets/placeholder.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskContent=()=>{const{taskData,isLoading,showFullDetailsView,fullDetailsViewData,noDataAfterFetch,errorMessage,setShowFullDetailsView,handleShowFullDetailsView,getNumberOfCompletedPhases}=useTaskContent();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"taskContent_container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{text:taskData===null||taskData===void 0?void 0:taskData.name}),noDataAfterFetch&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"taskContent_placeholder_container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:placeholder,alt:"Empty Placeholder"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:errorMessage?errorMessage:"Something went wrong"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"taskContent_loader_container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FallingLines,{color:primary,width:"60",visible:isLoading})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Stats,{currentPhase:getNumberOfCompletedPhases(),phasesSum:taskData===null||taskData===void 0?void 0:taskData.phases.length,CompletionDate:taskData?new Date(taskData===null||taskData===void 0?void 0:taskData.eta):undefined}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Track,{task:taskData,onClick:handleShowFullDetailsView}),showFullDetailsView&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FullDetailsView,{title:fullDetailsViewData.title,text:fullDetailsViewData.text,onClose:()=>setShowFullDetailsView(false)})]});};export default TaskContent;
